| ATP_ProdSpec_6   | Heading            | Product purpose and description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | Reviewed              |                   |                   |                | No          |                         |                    |                       |
| ATP_ProdSpec_7   | Information        | The purpose of the product is to partially or fully automate the manual trading of bonds, stocks, forex, crypto, etc. Here, the product is intended to support the effective and efficient use of trading time, as well as to minimize the use of personal lifetime for trading and to maximize the personal monetary profit. The goal is to be achieved by AI traders who trade automatically on accessible exchanges based on technical analysis, the experience of experts and their own experience, and use their information, such as charts and indicators. To achieve this, the user should be able to configure any number of configurable AI traders (e.g. which stock exchange should be used, which risk profile, how much budget, which trading strategies, etc.), which are based on trading profiles provided by the user (third-party povider). The performance and risk classification of the product and the product updates are evaluated, proven and improved via demo accounts.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | New                   |                   |                   |                |             |                         |                    |                       |

|                  |                    | import java.net.NetworkInterface
import java.net.InetAddress

fun isWirelessConnectionAvailable(): Boolean {
    return NetworkInterface.getNetworkInterfaces().toList().any { networkInterface ->
        networkInterface.name.contains("wi", ignoreCase = true) && networkInterface.isUp
    }
}

fun hasInternetConnection(): Boolean {
    return try {
        val address = InetAddress.getByName("www.google.com")
        !address.equals("")
    } catch (e: Exception) {
        false
    }
}

fun main() {
    if (isWirelessConnectionAvailable()) {
        println("Wireless connection is available.")
        if (hasInternetConnection()) {
            println("Internet connection is available via wireless.")
        } else {
            println("No Internet connection is available via wireless.")
        }
    } else {
        println("Wireless connection is not available.")
    }
}

Erklrung:
NetworkInterface.getNetworkInterfaces(): Diese Methode gibt eine Liste aller Netzwerkinterfaces auf dem System zurck. Du kannst durch diese Liste iterieren und prfen, ob ein Interface eine Wireless-Verbindung ist und ob es aktiv (isUp).
InetAddress.getByName("www.google.com"): Diese Methode versucht, die IP-Adresse der angegebenen Webseite abzurufen. Wenn dies gelingt, wird eine funktionierende Internetverbindung angenommen. |                       |                   |                   |                |             |                         |                    |                       |

---

## Configuration

| ID Prefix    | Requirement Type   | Requirement Status   | Test Type   | Test Status   | Product Releases   |
|--------------|--------------------|----------------------|-------------|---------------|--------------------|
| ATP_ProdSpec | Heading            | New                  | Automatic   | New           | Release 1.0.0      |
|              | Information        | Changed              | Manual      | Changed       | Release 1.1.0      |
|              | Function           | Review               | No          | Review        |                    |
|              | Non Function       | Reviewed             |             | Reviewed      |                    |
|              | Standard           | Rejected             |             | Rejected      |                    |
|              | Sub-heading        |                      |             |               |                    |
|              | Interface          |                      |             |               |                    |
|              | Parameter          |                      |             |               |                    |
